  • Uses of RandomEventInfo in model

    Methods in model that return types with arguments of type RandomEventInfo
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<RandomEventInfo>
    GameEnvironment.generateWeeklyEvents()
    Goes through each event and checks for its chance of occurring, If so the event if run and if the event occurs on the player team, it is added to the returned list which can then be passed onto the GUI.
